message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your valuation, but the product is worth a lot to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet at $17,500. Could we perhaps aim for $15,000?
